doc.previous: Mimara Museum (5 Roosevelt Square) was founded with a donation from Ante "Mimara" TopiÄ and opened to the public in 1987. It is located in a late 19th-century neo-Renaissance palace.[65] The holdings comprise 3,750 works of art of various techniques and materials, and different cultures and civilizations.
